title: Louise Kennedy’s Debut Novel Taps Into Her Childhood Amid the Troubles
description: The book, “Trespasses,” captures the texture of life in Northern Ireland — details, objects and images that carry “incredible emotional weight.”
dc:creator: Tobias Grey
media:credit: Ellius Grace for The New York Times
media:description: Louise Kennedy in Sligo, Ireland. Her family moved to Ireland to escape violence, including bombing attempts of her grandfather’s pub, in Northern Ireland. The experiences would later inform her writing.
